data.title: Oil and Gas Exploration in Oklahoma and Texas
data.meta_description: Novo Oil and Gas is a privately held oil and natural gas company focused on creating value from the ground up by developing assets using innovative exploration, drilling, and completion techniques.
data.text:
The quality of the rock drives our business.

We are not focused on geography. Instead, we go where compelling geology takes us. We have a strong and proven subsurface team that meticulously evaluates every opportunity.

We are passionate about what we do.

We come to work every day excited about our industry and work hard to create and grow a high-performing organization.

Innovation is central to the way we think.

Our name says it all. Novo is Latin for “to make new”. We have the conviction and confidence to trust our technical skills and experience and do things differently.

Every decision we make is deliberate, thoughtful, and designed to deliver value.

We are technically focused and commercially driven in all we do. Every decision we make is grounded in technical expertise. We don’t speculate. Instead, we believe every decision must be backed by a compelling technical story.

“The path to wisdom is paved with humility.”

We believe in teamwork and understand that great ideas can come from anywhere in our organization. In fact, we challenge one another to generate new ideas. Everyone is important and no one function or discipline supersedes another. (quote from author Tim Fargo).

We are good stewards.

We believe in the responsible use of capital and in protecting people, land, and the environment.

We are honest and respectful, and we keep our promises.

We value relationships and treat our contractors, vendors, leaseholders, community partners, investors, and other stakeholders the same way we treat one another. We hold ourselves accountable for our actions.
